docs.text: Overview Fit is the first 'game' developed to generate a large dataset of square packing solutions. Functions applyTransform() Responsible for moving the grid as well as zooming in/out of the grid view. centerViewOnGrid() Resets the grid view back to the center of the grid. clientToBoard() Convert from pixels to square length units. isInsideBoardViewport() getBoardSize() getRotatedSquareBounds(sq) updateStats() createSquareEl() addSquare() removeSquare() deleteAllSquares() updateSquare() updateAllSquareClasses() formerSquareUnit() formatRotation() pixelToCenterX() pixelToCenterY() centerToPixelX() centerToPixelY() applySquareDataInputs() updateSquareDataDisplay() getSquareCorners() pointInRotatedSquare() squaresOverlap() wouldCollide() isInDeleteZone() onPointerDown() onPointerMove() onPointerUp() onDoubleClick() onWheel()
